data.text: Awurade, ɔhene di anigye wɔ wʼahoɔden mu.
Woama no nea ne koma pɛ;
Wode nhyira a edi mu hyiaa no
Obisaa wo hɔ nkwa, na wode maa no,
Nkonimdi a woma no nti, nʼanuonyam so;
Ampa ara, woama no nhyira a ɛnsa da
Ɔhene no de ne ho to Awurade so;
Bere a wubeyi wo ho adi no
Wobɛtɔre wɔn ase wɔ asase so,
Ɛwɔ mu sɛ wɔbɔ pɔw tia wo
Yɛma wo so, Awurade, wɔ wʼahoɔden mu;
